item.title: Yell
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

when i put that command it show me when i compile

client.java:12244: illegal start of expression PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Mod]playerName+": "+comman d.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12244: not a statement PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Mod]playerName+": "+comman d.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12244: ';' expected PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Mod]playerName+": "+comman d.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12244: not a statement PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Mod]playerName+": "+comman d.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12246: illegal start of expression PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Admin]playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12246: not a statement PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Admin]playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12246: ';' expected PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Admin]playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12246: not a statement PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Admin]playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12248: illegal start of expression PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Owner]playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12248: not a statement PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Owner]playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12248: ';' expected PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Owner]playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ client.java:12248: not a statement PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Owner]playerName+": "+comm and.substring(5);} ^ 12 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Yell
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { if(muted == 1) sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!"); else if(playerRights == 1){ PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Mod]playerName+": "+command.substring(5);} else if(playerRights == 2){ PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Admin]playerName+": "+command.substring(5);} else if(playerRights == 3){ PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Owner]playerName+": "+command.substring(5);} else PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5); }
i give you this yet again
